questiontext.text:
sample(c("What is the function for average? `r moodlequiz::cloze('mean')`",
         "What is the function for standard deviation? `r moodlequiz::cloze('sd')`"), 1)

[1] “What is the function for standard deviation? r moodlequiz::cloze('sd')”

What is 2 + 2? {1:NUMERICAL:=4:0.05}

What is 2 + 3? {1:MULTICHOICE:2~4~5~~~=}

What is the command for calculating average? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%mean}
